mapper.select: SELECT count(*) cnt , category FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(cate, INSTR(cate, '>')+1)category FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(NVL(substr(category_name,0,instr(category_name,'>',1 ,2)-1),category_name),' ' , '') cate FROM upso ORDER BY LENGTH(cate) DESC ) caregory ) GROUP BY category ORDER BY cnt desc

SELECT txtcnt , memcnt, isuemem FROM (SELECT count(*) txtcnt FROM txt WHERE isshow = 'Y'), (SELECT count(*) memcnt FROM member WHERE isshow ='Y' and grade = 'M'), (SELECT count(*) isuemem FROM member WHERE issue ='X' and grade = 'M')
SELECT count(rev_no) rating_value_count, rating_upso rating_value FROM upso_review WHERE res_id = #{upso_id} AND isshow = 'Y' GROUP BY rating_upso
SELECT txtcnt, recnt FROM (SELECT count(*) txtcnt FROM txt WHERE mid = #{mid}), (SELECT count(*) recnt FROM upso_review WHERE mid = #{mid})
SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(*) cnt , category FROM txt , category WHERE txt.catno = category.catno AND MID = #{mid} GROUP BY category.category)
SELECT to_char(cdate , 'MM/dd') days , cnt FROM clientcnt WHERE cdate BETWEEN sysdate-7 and sysdate ORDER BY cdate asc
